titles.title: A concurrent resolution to provide the use of the Rotunda of the Capitol in honor of John F. Kennedy.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 976.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Yea-Nay Vote: 420 - 0 (Record Vote No: 395).

bill.summary: 8/9/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the use of the Rotunda of the Capitol on November 21 and 22, 1988, by the National Council of Returned Peace Corps Volunteers for a vigil of readings in honor of John F. Kennedy.
